>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/crm/settings/organisation/address"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a company address with the one specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"street":{"description":"New company street/building/apartment","type":"string"},"city":{"description":"New company city","type":"string"},"state":{"description":"New company state","type":"string"},"zip":{"description":"New company zip","type":"string"},"country":{"description":"New company country","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Updated company address","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
